text:
Vakha Agaev (15 March 1953 – 23 September 2020) was a Russian politician. He was a member of the State Duma representing the Krasnoyarsk region from 2011 until his death. He was a member of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation.
Agaev died on 23 September 2020 in Moscow from COVID-19, aged 67.

annotations.surface_form: Communist Party of the Russian Federation
